analyzed: dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dag gi yin gyi /

original: ngang tshul ngan pa dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: ngang tshul ngan pa dag gi ma yin te /
translated: not for those of faulty morality.

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //

original: gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //

original: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs rab tu 'thob pa dag gi yin gyi /
analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i stobs rab tu 'thob pa dag gi yin gyi /

original: gnod sems can dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: gnod sems can dag gi ma yin te /

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
translated: This is his vow.

analyzed: gang bzod pa dang / des par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //

analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa dag gi yin gyi; le lo can dag gi ma yin te /
translated: â€œEnlightenment is for bodhisattvas who have begun to strive, not for the lazy.

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //

original: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtson par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtson par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //

original: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la rab tu gnas pa dag gi yin gyi sems g-yeng ba dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la rab tu gnas pa dag gi yin gyi sems g-yeng ba dag gi ma yin te /
translated: â€œEnlightenment is for bodhisattvas who are established in concentration, not for those whose minds are distracted.

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
translated: This is the commitment.

original: gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par sgrub par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
translated: This is the truth of the matter.

original: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag gyi yin gyi /
analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag gyi yin gyi /
translated: â€œEnlightenment is for bodhisattvas who are endowed with wisdom,

original: shes rab 'chal bar dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: shes rab 'chal bar dag gi ma yin te /
translated: not for those who have poor wisdom.

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //

original: gang shes rab dang ye shes kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //ğŸ”½gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: gang shes rab dang ye shes kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o // gong ma bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The truth of that is the appearance of insight and pristine awareness.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po @421b dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po @421b dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong la'ang de bzhin no //
translated: The same should be applied to all the factors of awakening, the means of attraction, the stations of BrahmÄ, the superknowledges, the knowledges, tranquility, and insight.

original: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi dge ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa dag gi ma yin te /
analyzed: byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dag gi yin gyi dge ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa dag gi ma yin te /
translated: Awakening is for bodhisattvas who are endowed with all wholesome qualities, not for those who have abandoned wholesome qualities.

original: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o //

original: gang dge ba'i chos thams cad la kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: gang dge ba'i chos thams cad la kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o //
translated: The truth of that is the appearance of all wholesome qualities.

original: bu mo / gzhan yang /
analyzed: bu mo / gzhan yang /
translated: â€œMoreover, daughter,

analyzed: 'phags pa'i rnam pa'i bden pa de la byang chub sems dpas brtson par bya ste /
translated: the bodhisattva should strive for the noble truth of the aspects.

original: gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'byung ba spong ba dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam sgom pa'o //
translated: It is the knowledge of suffering, the abandonment of the origin, the realization of the cessation, and the cultivation of the path.

original: de la sdug bsngal shes pa ni gang phung po rnams la rang bzhin gyis mi skye bar shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la sdug bsngal shes pa ni gang phung po rnams la rang bzhin gyis mi skye bar shes pa'o //
translated: â€œThe knowledge of sufferingâ€ is the knowledge that the aggregates are essentially unborn.

original: kun 'byung ba spong ba ni srid pa gang gis phung po rnams yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i sred pa de shin tu mi 'byung zhing chags pa dang bral ba mngon par dga' ba med pa ste /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba spong ba ni srid pa gang gis phung po rnams yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i sred pa de shin tu mi 'byung zhing chags pa dang bral ba mngon par dga' ba med pa ste /
translated: â€œThe abandonment of the originâ€ is the non-occurrence of craving, the freedom from attachment, and the absence of delight in the craving that causes the aggregates to come into existence.

original: gang mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gang mngon par dga' ba med pa de ni gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa'o //

analyzed: gang gdod ma nas 'ong ba med pa de ni chos nyid ma spangs pa'o //
translated: â€œThe absence of coming from the beginningâ€ is the non-abandonment of the nature of reality.

original: gang chos nyid ma spangs pa de ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gang chos nyid ma spangs pa de ni kun 'byung ba spangs pa'o //
translated: â€œThe non-abandonment of the nature of realityâ€ is the abandonment of the origin.

original: de la 'gog pa shes pa ni gang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa shin tu zad cing 'gog pa ste /
analyzed: de la 'gog pa shes pa ni gang mtshan ma dang dmigs pa shin tu zad cing 'gog pa ste /
translated: â€œThe realization of cessationâ€ is the complete exhaustion and cessation of signs and reference points.

original: gang 'gog pa'i tshe dngos po 'jig par 'gyur ba'ang med la /
analyzed: gang 'gog pa'i tshe dngos po 'jig par 'gyur ba'ang med la /
translated: When one stops, there is no destruction of things.

original: dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po med pa mtshungs shing mnyam @422a *//
analyzed: dngos po yod pa dang / dngos po med pa mtshungs shing mnyam @422a *//

original: par gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gang mnyam par mthong ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: par gyur pa'i chos thams cad la gang mnyam par mthong ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o //

original: de la lam ni gang mnyam par lta zhing mnyam par sbyor ba /
analyzed: de la lam ni gang mnyam par lta zhing mnyam par sbyor ba /

original: mi rtog pa /
analyzed: mi rtog pa /
translated: without conceptualization,

analyzed: mi mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa /

analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad mi tshol ba /

analyzed: bdag gi med pa / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /

original: len pa med pa /
analyzed: len pa med pa /
translated: without appropriation,

analyzed: ma byas pa; rnam par ma byas pa 'di ni lam zhes bya'o //
translated: without action, and without activity. This is called the path.

original: 'di la gang bden pa shes pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yang dag par thob par byed kyang bdag mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'di la gang bden pa shes pa'i ye shes dang / sems can rnams yang dag par thob par byed kyang bdag mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Here, the bodhisattvasâ€™ truth is the knowledge of the truths and the wisdom that causes beings to attain the truth, but without manifesting it themselves.

analyzed: bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khrims bden pa shes pa yongs su bsgom pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob bo //

analyzed: bu mo / de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin zhe na /

original: gang gi tshe chos la rton par 'gyur ba /
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos la rton par 'gyur ba /

translated: they are teachers of the Dharma, they contemplate the Dharma, they think about the Dharma, they have the Dharma as their domain, they practice the Dharma, they strive for the Dharma, they desire the Dharma, they delight in the Dharma, they are devoted to the Dharma, they are an army of the Dharma,

translated: they are a banner of the Dharma, they are a weapon of the Dharma, they are clad in the armor of the Dharma, they are clad in the mail of the Dharma, they are the light of the Dharma, they are the lamp of the Dharma, they are the mindfulness of the Dharma, they are the intelligence of the Dharma,

original: chos rtog pa dang / chos dpyod pa dang / chos la sbyor ba dang / chos spyod par gyur pa dang / chos kyis nyal ba dang / chos kyi spyod lam dang / chos srung ba dang / chos kyi nor dang / chos mi zad pa dang /

translated: They are the Dharma, the investigation of the Dharma, the analysis of the Dharma, the application to the Dharma, the practice of the Dharma, the sleep of the Dharma, the conduct of the Dharma, the protection of the Dharma, the wealth of the Dharma, the imperishability of the Dharma,

analyzed: chos rgya che ba dang / chos kyi bya ba byed pa dang / chos kyi lus dang / chos kyi ngag dang / chos kyi yid la byed pa mi gtong ba ste /

original: chos spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de ni chos smra ba yin te /
analyzed: chos spyod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de ni chos smra ba yin te /

analyzed: chos ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no //

original: de la chos smra ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos smra ba gang zhe na /

original: bden pa gang yin pa de bden par smra ba dang / sangs rgyas la bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos la srung bar smra ba dang / dge 'dun la bla ma dang / sring zhu bya bar smra ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba bsnyad par smra ba dang /

translated: It is to speak the truth. It is to speak praise of the Buddha. It is to speak in defense of the Dharma. It is to speak of the Sangha as being worthy of offerings. It is to speak of the bodhisattva mind with conviction.

translated: It is to speak of not abandoning oneâ€™s intentions. It is to speak of focusing on higher intentions. It is to speak of not letting oneâ€™s practice decline. It is to speak of the view of the noble ones. It is to speak of relying on spiritual friends.

original: nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / ri mo bya ba smra ba dang / rtag tu bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos nyan pa na bsti steng du byas te mnyam pa smra ba dang / chos kun tu tshol bas mi ngoms pa smra ba dang /
analyzed: nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / ri mo bya ba smra ba dang / rtag tu bsngags pa smra ba dang / chos nyan pa na bsti steng du byas te mnyam pa smra ba dang / chos kun tu tshol bas mi ngoms pa smra ba dang /
translated: It is to speak of being respectful and deferential without pride. It is to speak of always being praised. It is to speak of listening to the Dharma with respect and equality. It is to speak of being insatiable in oneâ€™s pursuit of the Dharma.

analyzed: chos ston pa la snyoms las med pa smra ba dang / slob dpon chos 'chad pa med pa smra ba dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / @423a *// byas pa chud mi gson pa smra ba dang / lan la mi re ba smra ba dang / dgon pa la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang / 'phags pa'i rigs ma nyams pa smra ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mi gtong ba smra ba dang /
translated: â€œIt is to speak without laziness in teaching the Dharma. It is to speak without being a teacher who does not teach the Dharma. It is to speak with gratitude and appreciation.ğŸ”½â€œIt is to speak without wasting what has been done. It is to speak without expecting anything in return. It is to speak without fear of the wilderness. It is to speak without losing the family of the noble ones. It is to speak without abandoning the ascetic qualities.

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa smra ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba smra ba dang / tshul khrims kyi dbye ba smra ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs smra ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi zhum pa med pa smra ba dang /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa smra ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa smra ba dang / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba smra ba dang / tshul khrims kyi dbye ba smra ba dang / bzod pa'i stobs smra ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi zhum pa med pa smra ba dang /
translated: â€œIt is to speak of engaging in the path of the ten virtuous actions. It is to speak in praise of generosity. It is to speak of dedicating to awakening. It is to speak of the divisions of discipline. It is to speak of the power of patience. It is to speak of the indefatigability of diligence.

original: bsam gtan rnams kyi rab tu zhi ba smra ba dang / shes rab kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / thabs kyi yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang / byams pa'i skyabs smra ba dang / snying rje la 'jug pa smra ba dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams kyi rab tu zhi ba smra ba dang / shes rab kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / thabs kyi yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang / byams pa'i skyabs smra ba dang / snying rje la 'jug pa smra ba dang /
translated: They are the ones who speak of the peace of the dhyÄnas, the ones who speak of the realization of insight, the ones who speak of the illumination of methods, the ones who speak of the refuge of love, the ones who speak of the engagement of compassion,

original: dga' ba'i mchog tu dga' ba smra ba dang / btang snyoms kyi gnyis dang bral ba smra ba dang / bden pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa smra ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsnyad pa smra ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bskyed pa smra ba dang /
analyzed: dga' ba'i mchog tu dga' ba smra ba dang / btang snyoms kyi gnyis dang bral ba smra ba dang / bden pa rnams kyi rjes su mthun pa smra ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsnyad pa smra ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi bskyed pa smra ba dang /
translated: the ones who speak of the supreme joy of delight, the ones who speak of the equanimity that is free of the two, the ones who speak of the concordance with the truths, the ones who speak of the explanations of the correct understandings, the ones who speak of the generation of the higher perceptions,

original: rton pa rnams kyi chos smra ba dang / chos kyi mdo rnams kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi dran pa brjed pa med pa smra ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yang dag pa'i nan tan smra ba dang /
analyzed: rton pa rnams kyi chos smra ba dang / chos kyi mdo rnams kyi khong du chud pa smra ba dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi dran pa brjed pa med pa smra ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi yang dag pa'i nan tan smra ba dang /

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mngon par bskyed pa smra ba dang / dbang po @423b rnams kyi rno ba smra ba dang / stobs rnams kyi mi rdzi ba smra ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa smra ba dang /

translated: He spoke of the generation of the bases of miraculous powers, the sharpness of the faculties, the invincibility of the powers, and the realization of the branches of awakening.

translated: He spoke of the liberation of the path, the engagement of Å›amatha, the knowledge of the suchness of vipaÅ›yanÄ, the illumination of knowledge and liberation, and the stages of the hearers.

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston pa smra ba dang / theg pa chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su bsgrags pa smra ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs dang mthun pa smra ba dang / stong pa nyid la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang /

translated: The bodhisattva who speaks about the Dharma speaks of the practice of the Dharma that accords with the Dharma, of what is true, of the Dharma, and of what cannot be assailed by any opponent.

original: chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi phyir mi 'dra bar chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi phyir mi 'dra bar chos gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: The Dharma teacher does not see any Dharma that is different from awakening.

original: stong pa nyid las grol ba'i chos mi ston to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las grol ba'i chos mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach a Dharma that is not liberated from emptiness.

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos mi ston to //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las rnam par grol ba'i chos mi ston to //
translated: He does not teach a Dharma that is not liberated from signlessness, wishlessness, or liberation.

original: chos kyi dbyings tha dad du mi byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings tha dad du mi byed do //
translated: He does not divide the realm of phenomena.

original: de bzhin nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: He does not move from suchness.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' las shin tu mi 'da'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' las shin tu mi 'da'o //
translated: He does not transgress the limit of reality.

original: tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no // rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not rely on the words.ğŸ”½He does not rely on consciousness.

original: drang ba la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: drang ba la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not rely on the provisional meaning.

original: don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict the meaning.

original: tshig 'bru dang 'gal ba ma yin no //ğŸ”½ye shes dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshig 'bru dang 'gal ba ma yin no // ye shes dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict the words.ğŸ”½He does not contradict wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no //ğŸ”½nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang 'gal ba ma yin no // nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict consciousness.ğŸ”½He does not contradict the definitive meaning.

original: drang ba'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: drang ba'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict the provisional meaning.

original: chos nyid dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict reality.

original: gang zag dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zag dang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not contradict persons.

original: phyogs yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: phyogs yongs su 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: He does not take sides.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict dependent origination.

original: chos smra ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos gang gis kyang rnam par dag par mi shes so //
analyzed: chos smra ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos gang gis kyang rnam par dag par mi shes so //
translated: The Dharma teacher is not defiled by any worldly thing.

original: ser sna'i nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ser sna'i nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not obscured by the afflictions of stinginess.

original: tshul khrims las nyams pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims las nyams pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not violate morality.

original: ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems can @426b 'dor ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ngang tshul ngan pa'i sems can @426b 'dor ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not abandon beings with bad characters.

original: khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba can ma yin no //
analyzed: khro ba dang / gnod sems dang / tha ba can ma yin no //
translated: He is not angry, malicious, or harsh.

original: le lo'i dri ma dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: le lo'i dri ma dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not dwell together with the stain of laziness.

original: chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi sems brjed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos smra ba ni byang chub kyi sems brjed pa ma yin no //
translated: The Dharma teacher does not forget the thought of awakening.

original: shes rab kyi rtsa ba nyan pa chud gson pa ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab kyi rtsa ba nyan pa chud gson pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not waste the root of wisdom, listening.

original: gzhan la smod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la smod pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not disparage others.

original: gang zag la sdang ba dang / chos la sdang bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gang zag la sdang ba dang / chos la sdang bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not hate persons or the Dharma.

original: mdo sde dang mdo sde 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: mdo sde dang mdo sde 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sÅ«tras.

original: 'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin par mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the Vinaya.

original: chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict reality.

original: tshul bzhin sbyor ba'i chos gang la'ang chos ma yin par mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: tshul bzhin sbyor ba'i chos gang la'ang chos ma yin par mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see anything that is not the Dharma in any Dharma that is well applied.

original: nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed ngo //
analyzed: nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed ngo //
translated: He does not increase pride with pride.

original: chos las nyams pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos las nyams pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not fall away from the Dharma.

original: byas pa chud gson pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½bag la nyal mi 'dzin to //
analyzed: byas pa chud gson pa ma yin no // bag la nyal mi 'dzin to //
translated: He does not waste what has been done.ğŸ”½He does not hold on to latent tendencies.

original: bsti stang la rjes su chags pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsti stang la rjes su chags pa ma yin no //
translated: He is not attached to honor.

original: bsti stang med pa la khong khro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bsti stang med pa la khong khro ba ma yin no //
translated: He is not angry at those who are not honored.

original: mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnyis su 'du shes mi byed do //
analyzed: mdza' ba dang / mi mdza' ba la gnyis su 'du shes mi byed do //
translated: He does not conceive of friends and enemies as a duality.

original: rgyu dang / 'bras bu chud mi gson to //
analyzed: rgyu dang / 'bras bu chud mi gson to //
translated: He does not waste causes and effects.

original: chos smra ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi mos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos smra ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa la mi mos pa ma yin no //
translated: The Dharma teacher does not disbelieve in the ripening of karma.

original: smras pa'i lan mi ster ba ma yin no //
analyzed: smras pa'i lan mi ster ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not fail to answer questions.

original: chos smra ba ni dgra med pa'o //
analyzed: chos smra ba ni dgra med pa'o //
translated: The Dharma teacher is without enemies.

original: 'khrul pa mi tshol lo //
analyzed: 'khrul pa mi tshol lo //
translated: He does not seek out mistakes.

original: lce gnyis med do //
analyzed: lce gnyis med do //
translated: He does not have a forked tongue.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / sems la tshul 'chos pa med do //
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / sems la tshul 'chos pa med do //
translated: He does not have hypocrisy in his body, speech, or mind.

original: chos smra ba ni gzhan la nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½'thob par @427a *//
analyzed: chos smra ba ni gzhan la nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa ma yin no // 'thob par @427a *//
translated: The Dharma teacher does not live in the forest in order to show himself to others.

original: 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa chung ba ltar ston pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa chung ba ltar ston pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not show himself to be of few desires in order to obtain something.

original: 'dod chen che bas sdig pa ma yin no //ğŸ”½chos smra ba ni /
analyzed: 'dod chen che bas sdig pa ma yin no // chos smra ba ni /
translated: He is not greedy for gain.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gzhan gyis byas pa mi ston to //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub gzhan gyis byas pa mi ston to //
translated: The Dharma teacher does not show that the enlightenment of the buddhas is accomplished by others.

original: mi mnyam par len pa mi rtsom mo //
analyzed: mi mnyam par len pa mi rtsom mo //
translated: He does not initiate unequal taking.

original: nor bdun ma rung bar mi byed do //
analyzed: nor bdun ma rung bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not ruin the seven riches.

original: sha za ba ma yin no //
analyzed: sha za ba ma yin no //
translated: He does not eat meat.

original: pha'i rigs gcod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pha'i rigs gcod pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not cut off the family line.

original: gzhan gyi yon tan ma rung bar mi byed do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi yon tan ma rung bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not ruin the good qualities of others.

original: bdag gi yon tan brjod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi yon tan brjod pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not proclaim his own good qualities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad yod par ston pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad yod par ston pa ma yin no //
translated: He does not show the buddhadharmas to be limited.

original: nga chos smra ba ni theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas mi ngoms te /
analyzed: nga chos smra ba ni theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas mi ngoms te /
translated: â€œMy Dharma teacher is never satisfied with praising the MahÄyÄna.

original: de'i phyir na chos smra ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir na chos smra ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, they are called Dharma teachers.

original: bu mo / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: bu mo / de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin zhe na /
translated: â€œGirl, how are bodhisattvas expounders of the meaning?

original: don zhes bya ba ni bsam pas bcos ma ma yin pa ni don to //
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni bsam pas bcos ma ma yin pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is not fabricated by thought.

original: sbyor bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni don to //
analyzed: sbyor bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the accomplishment of all roots of virtue through application.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyod par ni don to //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyod par ni don to //

original: gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to //
analyzed: gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to //

original: sbyin pas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ni don to //
analyzed: sbyin pas rnam par smin pa la mi re ba ni don to //

original: sems can rnams bde ba myong bar byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: sems can rnams bde ba myong bar byed pa ni don to //

original: tshul khrims las nyams pa med pa ni don to //
analyzed: tshul khrims las nyams pa med pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the absence of degeneration in discipline.

original: bzod pas ma rmas pa ni don to //
analyzed: bzod pas ma rmas pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the absence of injury through patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa thams cad mthar 'byin pa ni don to //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa thams cad mthar 'byin pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the completion of all goals through diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyis nye bar zhi ba ni don to //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyis nye bar zhi ba ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the pacification through concentration.

original: @427b shes rab kyis the tshom med pa ni don to //
analyzed: @427b shes rab kyis the tshom med pa ni don to //
translated: Meaning is the absence of doubt through wisdom.

original: byams pas sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ni don to //
analyzed: byams pas sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of loving kindness is to have an attitude of impartiality toward all sentient beings.

original: snying rjes sems can thams cad kyi ci bya ba byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: snying rjes sems can thams cad kyi ci bya ba byed pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of compassion is to do what is to be done for all sentient beings.

original: dga' bas chos la dga' zhing mos pa ni don to //
analyzed: dga' bas chos la dga' zhing mos pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of joy is to delight in and be devoted to the Dharma.

original: btang snyoms kyis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad mi 'byed pa ni don to;/
analyzed: btang snyoms kyis bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad mi 'byed pa ni don to;/
translated: The meaning of equanimity is to be free from all happiness and suffering.

original: sbyin pas 'gyod pa med pa ni don to //
analyzed: sbyin pas 'gyod pa med pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of generosity is to be without regret.

original: snyan par smra bas khong khro ba med pa ni don to //
analyzed: snyan par smra bas khong khro ba med pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of speaking pleasantly is to be without anger.

original: don byed pas chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: don byed pas chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of doing what is purposeful is to fulfill the intention that is in accord with the Dharma.

original: don mthun pas sems can rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to //
analyzed: don mthun pas sems can rnams theg pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of being consistent is to cause sentient beings to take up the Great Vehicle.

original: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the means of attraction is to ripen sentient beings.

original: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ni don to //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ni don to //
translated: The meaning of all conditioned things is impermanence and suffering.

original: chos thams cad bdag med pa ni don to //
analyzed: chos thams cad bdag med pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of all phenomena is selflessness.

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba ni don to //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ba ni don to //
translated: The pacification of all afflictions is the meaning.

original: tshig 'bru las don la rton pa ni don to //
analyzed: tshig 'bru las don la rton pa ni don to //
translated: Relying on the meaning rather than the letter is the meaning.

original: rnam par shes pa las ye shes la rton pa ni don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa las ye shes la rton pa ni don to //
translated: Relying on wisdom rather than consciousness is the meaning.

original: mdo sde thams cad las nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa ni don to //
analyzed: mdo sde thams cad las nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa ni don to //
translated: Relying on the sÅ«tras of definitive meaning rather than the sÅ«tras of interpretable meaning is the meaning.

original: srog dang / gang zag gi sgra las chos nyid la rton pa ni don to //ğŸ”½don so so yang dag par rig pas bstan pa mi zad pa ni don to //
analyzed: srog dang / gang zag gi sgra las chos nyid la rton pa ni don to // don so so yang dag par rig pas bstan pa mi zad pa ni don to //
translated: Relying on reality rather than the words â€œlifeâ€ or â€œpersonâ€ is the meaning.ğŸ”½The inexhaustibility of the teaching through the correct discrimination of meaning is the meaning.

original: chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyis dbyings 'dres pa med pa ni don to //
analyzed: chos so so yang dag par rig pas chos kyis dbyings 'dres pa med pa ni don to //
translated: The indivisibility of the realm of reality through the correct discrimination of the teaching is the meaning.

original: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par @428a *//ğŸ”½rig pas phung po ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni don to //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par @428a *// rig pas phung po ma lus pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ni don to //
translated: The correct discrimination of language is the meaning.ğŸ”½The correct discrimination of eloquence is the meaning.

original: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ci rigs par chos ston pa ni don to //
analyzed: spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pas ci rigs par chos ston pa ni don to //
translated: The teaching of the Dharma in an appropriate manner is the meaning.

original: sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa ni don to //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa ni don to //
translated: The accumulation of generosity is the meaning.

original: tshul khrims kyi tshogs las smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi tshogs las smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
translated: The fulfillment of the perfection of vows through the accumulation of morality is the aim.

original: thos pa'i tshogs las nan tan snying por byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: thos pa'i tshogs las nan tan snying por byed pa ni don to //
translated: The making of effort the essence through the accumulation of learning is the aim.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs las mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs las mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni don to //
translated: The perfection of the major marks through the accumulation of merit is the aim.

original: ye shes kyi tshogs las sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni don to //
analyzed: ye shes kyi tshogs las sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa ni don to //
translated: The knowledge of the faculties of all sentient beings through the accumulation of wisdom is the aim.

original: zhi gnas kyi tshogs las sems las su rung ba ni don to //
analyzed: zhi gnas kyi tshogs las sems las su rung ba ni don to //
translated: The pliability of mind through the accumulation of serenity is the aim.

original: lhag mthong gi tshogs las rig pa dang rnam par grol ba ni don to //
analyzed: lhag mthong gi tshogs las rig pa dang rnam par grol ba ni don to //
translated: The knowledge and liberation through the accumulation of transcendent insight is the aim.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni don to //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni don to //
translated: The establishment of mindfulness through the applications of mindfulness is the aim.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa ni don to //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa ni don to //
translated: The generation of all virtuous qualities through the right efforts is the aim.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis phyogs bcur bgrod pa ni don to //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis phyogs bcur bgrod pa ni don to //
translated: The going in the ten directions through the bases of supernatural powers is the aim.

original: dbang po rnams kyis tshig rab tu 'byed pa ni don to //
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyis tshig rab tu 'byed pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the faculties is the discernment of words.

original: stobs rnams kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba ni don to //
analyzed: stobs rnams kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the powers is the subduing of all afflictions.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni don to //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the branches of enlightenment is the comprehension of all phenomena.

original: lam gyis chos thams cad mi 'khrugs pa ni don to //
analyzed: lam gyis chos thams cad mi 'khrugs pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the path is the non-disturbance of all phenomena.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las shin @428b tu nyams pa med pa ni don to //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las shin @428b tu nyams pa med pa ni don to //
translated: The meaning of the superknowledges is the absence of complete decline.

original: de ltar na gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu las don rab tu myong ba de ni 'di ltar don smra ba yin to /
analyzed: de ltar na gang chos rnam pa 'di lta bu las don rab tu myong ba de ni 'di ltar don smra ba yin to /
translated: Thus, one who experiences the meaning of such aspects of phenomena is said to speak of meaning.

original: don ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don ma yin pa smra ba ma yin no //
translated: One does not speak of non-meaning.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin no //
translated: Thus, a bodhisattva is one who speaks of meaning.

original: bu mo / gzhan yang /
analyzed: bu mo / gzhan yang /
translated: â€œMoreover, daughter,

original: dmigs par lta ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi don ni don te /
analyzed: dmigs par lta ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi don ni don te /
translated: the meaning of emptiness is the pacification of all views of objectification.

original: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
translated: A bodhisattva who speaks of emptiness speaks of meaning.

original: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i don ni don to //
analyzed: rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i don ni don to //
translated: The meaning of signlessness is the meaning of the elimination of all conceptualization and discursive thought.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
translated: The bodhisattva who speaks of signlessness speaks the meaning.

original: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i don ni don te /
analyzed: khams gsum pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i don ni don te /
translated: The meaning of wishlessness is the meaning of the absence of all wishes in the three realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa' smon pa med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' smon pa med pa smra ba ni don smra ba yin no //
translated: The bodhisattva who speaks of wishlessness speaks the meaning.

original: de bzhin du bsdus te 'du byed thams cad kyi rgyun bcad pa'i phyir mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i don ni don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsdus te 'du byed thams cad kyi rgyun bcad pa'i phyir mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i don ni don to //
translated: Similarly, the meaning of non-performance is the meaning of the cessation of the continuity of all formations.

original: skye ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i don ni don to //
analyzed: skye ba thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir skye ba med pa'i don ni don to //
translated: The meaning of non-arising is the meaning of the pacification of all births.

original: skye ba nye bar len pa'i skye ba thams cad mi skye mi 'byung ba'i don ni don to //
analyzed: skye ba nye bar len pa'i skye ba thams cad mi skye mi 'byung ba'i don ni don to //

original: nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: He dwells watching internal phenomena as phenomena,

original: smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
translated: bringing mindfulness to bear and exercising clear comprehension, but without being attached to phenomena.

original: phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /ğŸ”½smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
analyzed: phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te / smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
translated: He dwells watching external phenomena as phenomena, and he dwells watching external phenomena and internal phenomena as phenomena,ğŸ”½bringing mindfulness to bear and exercising clear comprehension, but without being attached to phenomena.

original: lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
analyzed: lus la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
translated: He dwells contemplating the unattractiveness of the body,

original: @455b mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
analyzed: @455b mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro //
translated: He applies himself to keeping in mind impermanence, suffering, selflessness, and repulsiveness.

original: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
analyzed: yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su bsgrubs pa'i phyir lus kyi las legs par sbyor ba'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
translated: And in order to accomplish the body of the TathÄgata, he does not interrupt the continuity of his application to physical actions.

original: tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
analyzed: tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
translated: He cultivates the application of mindfulness that engages with feelings.

original: stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang ngan song thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcad pa'i phyir sems can de dag la snying rje chen po'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
translated: He applies himself to keeping in mind the aspect of emptiness, but because he sees all sentient beings who have been born in the lower realms, he does not interrupt the continuity of his great compassion for those sentient beings in order to eliminate all their painful feelings.

original: sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
analyzed: sems la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
translated: He cultivates the application of mindfulness that engages with the mind.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed la theg pa chen po'i tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun kyang mi gcod do //
translated: He applies himself to the mental activity of signlessness, but does not forget the thought of awakening, and does not interrupt the continuity of the practice that accomplishes the accumulations of the Great Vehicle.

original: chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
analyzed: chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste /
translated: He cultivates the application of mindfulness that is directed to the Dharma.

original: smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyang mngon sum du mi byed la /
translated: He applies himself to the mental activity of wishlessness, but does not actualize the reality of freedom from attachment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yang 'tsham pa yin te /
translated: He is also in harmony with the qualities of a Buddha.

original: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang / dbus med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: He penetrates the realm of the Dharma, which is without end or middle.

original: de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: When he attains awakening, endowed with this adoption of the Dharma, the Thus-Gone One is said to be without any decline in mindfulness.

original: de la de med pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de med pa yin no //
translated: He is free from that.

original: spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin @456a *//
analyzed: spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pas ting nge 'dzin @456a *//
translated: He is endowed with the applications of abandonment, and with concentration.

original: shin tu bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang; da ltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / dbang po dang / khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu bsgoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa kun bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang; da ltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / dbang po dang / khams dang / mos pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /
translated: Through the miracle of teaching, they know the past and future of all beings, their mind streams, their faculties, their dispositions,

original: nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / tshe dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags dang / bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / tshe dang /
translated: their habitual tendencies, their intentions, their latent tendencies, their entanglements, their virtuous and nonvirtuous actions, their ripening, their lives,

original: 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang / zhing du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / bskal pa dang / zhing du sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /
translated: their deaths, their rebirths, their succession of kalpas, their succession of buddhafields, their succession of assemblies of Å›rÄvakas, and their succession of predictions of the conduct of bodhisattvas.

translated: He has unimpeded and unconfused recollection of the teachings of the lineage of parents, relatives, and blood relations.

translated: â€œ â€˜Moreover, daughter, when bodhisattvas practice bodhisattva activity,

analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shes rab @456b spyod pa yin te /
translated: they always and continuously practice wisdom.

translated: They have the light of wisdom, the illumination of wisdom, the analysis of wisdom, the faculty of wisdom, sharp wisdom, profound wisdom, definitive wisdom, and untamed wisdom.

analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i shes rab dang / yangs shing rgya che la sems snyoms pa'i shes rab dang / lhag pa'i shes rab dang / bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi lung mnos pa med pa'i shes rab dang /
translated: It is the wisdom that is not overwhelmed, the wisdom that is difficult for all Å›rÄvakas and pratyekabuddhas to fathom, the wisdom that is vast, extensive, and impartial, the wisdom that is superior, the wisdom that is not dependent on the instructions of proper mental attention,

analyzed: thos pa tshol bas ngoms mi myong ba'i shes rab can te /
translated: and the wisdom that is never satisfied with seeking learning.

analyzed: thos nas kyang shes rab kyis khong du chud cing rtogs te /

analyzed: mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du bsti stang byed cing thos pa tshol la thos pa snying por byed pa yin /

original: dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te /
translated: They are diligent in seeking the sublime Dharma.

original: de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs su mi gtong ba med do //
analyzed: de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs su mi gtong ba med do //
translated: There is nothing that such a one, who is desirous of the Dharma, will not give up, either outside or within.

analyzed: de bla ma la rim gro bya ba mi byed pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is nothing that such a one will not do to serve the guru.

analyzed: de sdug bsngal gyi phung po mi bzod pa gang yang med do //
translated: There is no suffering that such a one will not endure.

analyzed: de bde ba'i yo byad mi 'dod pa gang yang med do // de chos 'dod pa des tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa la @457a *//
translated: There is no comfort that such a one will not forego.

original: shin tu dga' ba yin te /
analyzed: shin tu dga' ba yin te /
translated: Such a one, who is desirous of the Dharma, will be more pleased to hear a single verse of four lines

analyzed: stor gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la ni ma yin no //

analyzed: chos kyi chog  gcig la shin tu dga' ba yin te /

analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mnyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te /
translated: Such a one will be more pleased to hear the path of the perfections

analyzed: brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thob pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: than to gain the status of Åšakra or BrahmÄ.

analyzed: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la ston par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te /
translated: He is very pleased to teach a single verse of four lines to others,

analyzed: gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la ni ma yin no //

analyzed: gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te /

translated: but not to obtain a universal monarch's kingdom as numerous as the sands of the Ganges.

analyzed: gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam rab tu ston pa la dga' ba yin te /

translated: but not to obtain Åšakra or BrahmÄ as numerous as the sands of the Ganges.ğŸ”½Engaged in such an altruistic intention, he listens to the Dharma with respect,

analyzed: de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas bsti stang du byed cing chos nyan to; ;bsti stang du byed cing gzhan la ston to //

analyzed: de lhas yongs su bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad bdag nyid la mngon sum du 'gyur ba yin no //

analyzed: de shes rab kyi snang ba'i sgo zad mi shes pas snang ba ma yin no //
translated: Since he has the inexhaustible door of the light of wisdom, he is not in the dark.

original: de chos kyi snang ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de chos kyi snang ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste /

original: de la de med pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de med pa yin no //
translated: He is without that.

original: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /

translated: â€œHis wisdom is unobstructed and unobscured with regard to all these things.

analyzed: de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med de /

analyzed: pa rnams la bstan kyang thug pa med do //

analyzed: chos kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par sgrub pa 'di ni /

analyzed: bu mo / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o //
translated: Daughter, this is the tenth of the thus-gone onesâ€™ unique qualities of buddhahood.

original: bu mo / gzhan yang /
analyzed: bu mo / gzhan yang /
translated: â€œMoreover, daughter,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
translated: when bodhisattvas practice bodhisattva conduct,

analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khyim gyi gnas don du mi gnyer ba yin /
translated: They never pursue a household life.

analyzed: de khyim nas 'byung bar dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mang ba yin /
translated: They delight in leaving home and in going forth.ğŸ”½They are devoted to solitude,

analyzed: dben pa la gzhol /

analyzed: dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson te / de stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di dag sgom mo //
translated: They are dedicated to the practice of meditation on the profound Dharma.ğŸ”½They cultivate these three doors of liberation, namely, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing mi rtogs pa dang / dmigs par lta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo de dag bsgoms pas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o //
analyzed: gang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi yul ma yin zhing mi rtogs pa dang / dmigs par lta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyis rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum bo de dag bsgoms pas sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o //
translated: By cultivating these three doors of liberation, which are not within the range of any adversaries, which are not within the range of any non-Buddhists, and which are not within the range of any of those who delight in the signs of conceptualization and objectification, they give rise to the liberation called â€˜unobstructed.â€™

original: chags pa med @458b pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chags pa med @458b pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the light of non-attached wisdom.

original: bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'da'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu 'da'o //
translated: He transcends the domain of Mara.

original: ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the domain of wisdom.

original: sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do //
analyzed: sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad la mi spyod do //
translated: He does not engage in any obscurations, obstructions, entanglements, views, afflictions, or signs.

original: de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu thob cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtsen pas chos zab mo ston pa yin no //
analyzed: de sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa rab tu thob cing rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la rnam par rtsen pas chos zab mo ston pa yin no //
translated: He attains the unobstructed liberation and, sporting in the three gates of liberation, he teaches the profound Dharma.

original: don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don la rton pa yin gyi tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He relies on the meaning, not on the words.

original: ye shes la rton pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ye shes la rton pa yin gyi rnam par shes pa la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He relies on wisdom, not on consciousness.

original: nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi drang pa'i don la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nges pa'i don la rton pa yin gyi drang pa'i don la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He relies on the definitive meaning, not on the interpretable meaning.

original: chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid la rton pa yin gyi gang zag la rton pa ma yin no //
translated: He relies on reality, not on the individual.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te /
translated: It is the support of all sentient beings.

original: yi ge dang / rnam par rtog pa'i chags zhen pa la don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: yi ge dang / rnam par rtog pa'i chags zhen pa la don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: It liberates those who are attached to the signs of letters and concepts by teaching them to rely on the meaning.

original: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //ğŸ”½drang bar sgro btags pa la chags zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do // drang bar sgro btags pa la chags zhen pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: It liberates those who are attached to the signs of consciousness by teaching them to rely on wisdom.ğŸ”½It liberates those who are attached to the superimposition of the interpretable meaning by teaching them to rely on the definitive meaning.

original: gang zag la mngon par zhen cing chags zhen pa la chos nyid la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: gang zag la mngon par zhen cing chags zhen pa la chos nyid la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: It liberates those who are attached to the individual by teaching them to rely on reality.

original: lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags zhen pa la rton pa nyid bstan nas @459a *//ğŸ”½yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags zhen pa la rton pa nyid bstan nas @459a *// yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: It liberates those who are attached to the sixty-two views by teaching them to rely on the scriptures.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags zhen pa la mtshan ma med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa thams cad la chags zhen pa la mtshan ma med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: It liberates those who are attached to all the obscurations of conceptual thought by teaching them the signless.

original: khams gsum la chags zhen pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: khams gsum la chags zhen pa la smon pa med pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: For those attached to the three realms, he teaches the absence of wishes and liberates them.

original: 'dod chags kyi chags zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i rnam pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //ğŸ”½zhe sdang spyod pa la chags zhen pa la byams pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chags zhen pa la mi sdug pa'i rnam pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do // zhe sdang spyod pa la chags zhen pa la byams pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: For those attached to desire, he teaches the aspects of repulsiveness and liberates them.ğŸ”½For those attached to the practice of hatred, he teaches love and liberates them.

original: gti mug spyod pa la chags zhen pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: gti mug spyod pa la chags zhen pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: For those attached to the practice of delusion, he teaches dependent origination and liberates them.

original: ser sna la chags zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //ğŸ”½ngan pa'i ngang tshul la chags zhen pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: ser sna la chags zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do // ngan pa'i ngang tshul la chags zhen pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: For those attached to stinginess, he teaches the perfection of generosity and liberates them.ğŸ”½For those attached to bad character, he teaches the perfection of morality and liberates them.

original: gnod sems la chags zhen pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: gnod sems la chags zhen pa la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: For those attached to malice, he teaches the perfection of patience and liberates them.

original: le lo la chags zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: le lo la chags zhen pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the perfection of effort to those attached to laziness and liberates them.

original: g-yeng ba la chags zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: g-yeng ba la chags zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the perfection of meditation to those attached to distraction and liberates them.

original: 'chal ba'i shes rab la chags zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: 'chal ba'i shes rab la chags zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the perfection of wisdom to those attached to faulty wisdom and liberates them.

original: so so'i skye bo'i @459b sa la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i @459b sa la chags zhen pa la 'phags pa'i bden pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the noble truths to those attached to the state of ordinary beings and liberates them.

original: phyin ci log la chags zhen pa la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: phyin ci log la chags zhen pa la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches impermanence, suffering, no-self, and peace to those attached to error and liberates them.

original: sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad la chags zhen pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas dkris pa dang / lta ba thams cad la chags zhen pa la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the liberation free from obscurations to those who are attached to all obscurations, blockages, entanglements, and views.

original: nyon mongs pa can thams cad la chags zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can thams cad la chags zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do //
translated: He teaches the factors of awakening to those who are attached to all afflictions, and liberates them.

original: de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol bar nyams par med pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol bar nyams par med pa zhes bya ste /
translated: When he attains awakening, endowed with this perfect adoption of the Dharma, he is called a thus-gone one whose liberation is undiminished.

original: de la de med pa yin no //
analyzed: de la de med pa yin no //
translated: He is free from that.

original: de'i rnam par grol ba de mi 'khrugs shing shin tu mthar thug ste /
analyzed: de'i rnam par grol ba de mi 'khrugs shing shin tu mthar thug ste /
translated: His liberation is unshakable and utterly final.

original: dpa' rlabs med la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos por gyur cing zab ste /
analyzed: dpa' rlabs med la shin tu bsil ba'i dngos por gyur cing zab ste /
translated: It is free from waves and has become a state of utter coolness.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpag dka' ba yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gting dpag dka' ba yin /
translated: It is profound and difficult for all hearers and solitary buddhas to fathom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba ste /
translated: It is the same as all the buddhas.

original: dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te rnyog pa med pa'i shin tu yongs su dag pa yin /
analyzed: dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral te rnyog pa med pa'i shin tu yongs su dag pa yin /
translated: It is stainless, free from stains, and without turbidity.

original: zhi gnas dang; lhag mthong gi sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byed pas zad mi shes pa yin /
analyzed: zhi gnas dang; lhag mthong gi sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byed pas zad mi shes pa yin /
translated: It is inexhaustible because it is purified on the levels of Å›amatha and vipaÅ›yanÄ.

original: bstan pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin /
analyzed: bstan pa mtha' yas mu med pa yin /
translated: It is limitless and boundless.

original: chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin /
analyzed: chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin /
translated: It is without attachment and without obscuration.

original: nam @460a *// mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin te /
analyzed: nam @460a *// mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin te /
translated: It is gathered in the realm of space.

original: dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pas gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun pa yin te /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang / chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pas gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun pa yin te /
translated: It is the cause for the Dharma teachings of the characteristics of liberation of all the tathÄgatas, because it is the meditation on the essence of stainless samÄdhi and the dhÄraá¹‡Ä« expertise that illuminates all phenomena.

original: thams cad las byung zhing chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: thams cad las byung zhing chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin /
translated: It is the source of everything and illuminates all phenomena.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin /
translated: They are intent on nirvÄá¹‡a.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab pa yin /
translated: They are focused on nirvÄá¹‡a.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin te /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la bab pa yin te /
translated: They are intent on nirvÄá¹‡a.

original: shin tu mthar thug cing shin tu mthar phyin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: shin tu mthar thug cing shin tu mthar phyin pa 'di ni /
translated: This is the ultimate, the final point.

original: bu mo / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o; ;bu mo /
analyzed: bu mo / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o; ;bu mo /
translated: Daughter, this is the eleventh unique quality of a thus-gone one.

original: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ye shes lhur len pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ye shes lhur len pa yin te /
translated: â€œ â€˜Moreover, daughter, when bodhisattvas practice bodhisattva activity, they are intent on wisdom.

original: ye shes kyi stobs dang / ye shes la 'bab pa dang / ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: ye shes kyi stobs dang / ye shes la 'bab pa dang / ye shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They have the power of wisdom, are focused on wisdom, and possess the blessings of wisdom.

original: de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa med pa 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las nges par byung ba'o; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa med pa 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las nges par byung ba'o; ;thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: Their wisdom is undiminishing and arises from training in the superknowledges of beings. They have the intelligence that analyzes with omniscient wisdom.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas @460b 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //ğŸ”½'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa'i blo dang ldan pas @460b 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so // 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la'ang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: With the wisdom of omniscience and an analytical mind, he knows a mind with desire as a mind with desire just as it is.ğŸ”½He knows a mind without desire as a mind without desire just as it is.

analyzed: zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa dang /

analyzed: chung du dang / cher gyur pa dang / mtha' dang bcas pa dang / mtha' yas pa dang / ser sna dang ldan pa dang / gtong @461a *//
translated: the small, the large, the limited, the limitless, the stingy, the generous,

translated: the mind of bad character, the mind of application to morality, the latent tendency to malice, the absence of malice, laziness, the possession of effort, distraction,
